name: Are High Availability Services Right
short_description: According to Microsoft’s TechNet, High Availability (HA) is measured by the percentage of time IT systems are available. High availability is further defined by two related and essential business elements: disaster recovery and business continuity. Without both elements, businesses today can’t survive, making high availability services (HAS) essential for ongoing business success. Still not convinced that HA is right for your business? Here’s a closer look at what HA is and how it affects business continuity.
